entry.title: VANGELO Women Sandal LANA Comfort Wedge Sandal Pink
entry.summary:
Vendor: VANGELO
Type: Women Sandal Comfort Wedge Sandal
Price: 336.00

  • Comfort Wedge Sandal of Fabric Upper Features Metallic Accents Finish
  • Slip-on Construction with Open Toe Silhouette, and Adjustable Velcro Closure at Instep Offers a Secure Fit
  • Breathable Fabric Strap Lining and Lightly Cushioned EVA Footbed with Vegan Leather Top Cover for Added Comfort
  • Flexible Rubber Outsole, Heel Measures Approx. 1.5"
    • Perfect for Summer Season

entry.title: VANGELO Women Sandal HAVEN Comfort Wedge Sandal Champagne
entry.summary:
Vendor: VANGELO
Type: Women Sandal Wedge Sandal
Price: 336.00

  • Add a Little Fashion Inspiration to Your Summer Look with this Attractive Comfort VANGELO Wedge Sandal
  • Faux Leather Upper Wedge Sandal Features An Open Toe with Crisscrossing Straps
  • Perforated Pattern Along Straps for Added Breathability
  • Convenient Slip-on
  • Soft Lining and Soft Footbed Bring Comfort with Each and Every Step
  • Rubber Outsole Delivers Long-Lasting Durability On a Variety of Surfaces
  • Wedge Heel Measures Approx. 1.75", and Platform Measures Approx. 0.75"
